Sentence.string: Your wife told us you had some money problems with the show ?

Aaaah Rose, this kind of situation makes me realise how much she loves me. She’s always preoccupied about me. Don’t worry, it’s not a big deal, these are just the typical problems we face at the beginning of a series of performances. Money is not the most important element in life, but friendship is, and I’ve just lost one who was dear to me.
